creator: goetze@dovetail.com
text:
This task currently supports an encoding attribute which specifies the original
file encoding.  It would be useful to also allow a targetEncoding to be
specified.  This would make it possible to prepare files for platforms with
different native encodings (e.g. EBCDIC).

Created attachment 18384
Proposed patch for FixCRLF task to support targetEncoding

This patch was created against the 407562 revision (2006-05-13) of
org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/FixCRLF.java
creator: goetze@dovetail.com

The meat of the patch is fine; however some weird differences seem to have crept

erroneous to something that works; current SVN is already like your final
result, except for the fully-qualified FixCrLfFilter references.  Please correct
and resubmit.
